channel.title: Uke Along Artist » The Black Eyed Peas

item.title: The Black Eyed Peas - I’ve Got A Feeling - Key of C
item.description:
This video is for educational purposes only.
Easy and full guitar chords, along with bass notes are highlighted simultaneously so that your students of all levels can play together.
Music by Black Eyed Peas.

item.title: The Black Eyed Peas - I Gotta Feeling - Key of C
item.description: Update with accurate lyrics. Chords = G, C, Em. Possible strum pattern = Down for 8 beats per chord diagram...sometimes (when the sound is more driving in the recording) switch to DU for 8 beats per chord diagram.
